text: Stop skullking around and get a mop. And maybe a dustpan. There are bones everywhere.
You can also order Fetchers to retrieve skeleton parts.
You can rebuild skeletons in the Builder. Once you have all the parts, click on the icon in the bottom right of the screen.
You will be able to add the parts to the blueprint by clicking them on the right.
You can exit the builder by pressing C.
Not even a thank you, these skeletons have no manners...
